英文法規名稱: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Plant Origin
中文法規名稱: 蔬果植物類重金屬限量標準
沿革內容:
1. DOH Food No. 1001301183 Announced, 30/5/2011
2. Amended on FAugust 20, 2013

法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
The classification of vegetables, fruits, herbs and spices,which are referred in the Standards for maximum tolerance of heavy metals in plant origin are listed in the Appendix.

Maximum tolerance of heavy metals in edible plant origin shall meet the following Table:(wet weight basis)

┌─────────────────┬──────┬─────┐
│              ＼　Heavymetal      │Cadmium     │Lead      │
│FoodCategory    ＼                │            │          │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Leafy vegetables                  │0.2   ppm   │0.3   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Brassica vegetables               │0.05  ppm   │0.3   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Root and tuber vegetables, Stalk  │0.1   ppm   │0.3   ppm │
│and stem vegetables               │            │          │
│(not to includeBulb vegetables)   │            │          │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Bulb vegetables                   │0.05  ppm   │0.1   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Fruiting vegetables               │0.05  ppm   │0.1   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Pulses and Legume Vegetables      │0.2   ppm   │0.2   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Berries and other small fruits    │0.05  ppm   │0.2   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Citrus fruits                     │0.05  ppm   │0.1   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Pome fruits                       │0.05  ppm   │0.1   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Stone fruits                      │0.05  ppm   │0.1   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Melons                            │0.05  ppm   │0.1   ppm │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Other assorted (sub)tropical      │0.05  ppm   │0.1   ppm │
│fruits                            │            │          │
├─────────────────┼──────┼─────┤
│Herbs and Spices (fresh)          │0.2   ppm   │0.3   ppm │
└─────────────────┴──────┴─────┘

This Standard shall be implemented from June 1, 2011.
The amended articles hereof shall come into effect as of the day of promulgation.
